entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
